column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I absolutely love this place. Lovely atmosphere and setting: so European. The food is pretty amazing too: best pain perdu and pulled pork sandwich I've ever had. Caramel latte is pretty good- I'll order "extra hot" next time since it was rather cold when served. Cheese cake is great and so are the chocolate croissants
column2: oh and huge! Servers are pretty friendly too except for one who wasn't too pleased when I asked him to warm up my drink and then a to go box. Will definitely go back for pain perdu and try out the assortment of pastries!
